ygData.subject: RE: Bard envy
ygData.msgSnippet: I m betting the breastplate isn t as good as mithril anyway.  Breastplate and Helm are last on my list of items to get. Elwyn ... From: Garramone, Michael
ygData.messageBody:
I'm betting the breastplate isn't as good as mithril anyway. Breastplate
and Helm are last on my list of items to get.


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 12:41 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard envy


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

lambent stone is lore, it is not no drop. it is apparently a rare drop on
the HGs, SGs, and Griffs. i was unable to loot one, i was lucky to have one
given to me. then i lost it in the breastplate quest, going to talk to the
server GM later.

Shada

> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> It has been pstulated that Lambent Stones may not be No Drop
> since several
> different classes can use them for quests. Shada you have had these
> apparently, care to weigh in?
>
> Kitasi
